channel.title: What the Ferment
channel.itunes:subtitle: The art, science and history of food fermentation.
channel.itunes:author: FermUp
channel.itunes:summary: What the Ferment answers your fermented food and beverage questions. From the creators of FermUp comes an easily digestible morsel of fermented goodness every week.
